title: Are there any other countries out there where "How far away is x?" is answered in time?
body: I can't think of any reason why I would want to know the distance X is away from me when I'm traveling there. I clearly just want to know how long it'll take me, and I am so happy that the other people around me think the same, but I have friends in America that always give me a straight-up distance, like "Oh it's y miles" and I'm like "That doesn't help me a single bit."
